document.title: EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool
document.paragraph:
This section contains documentation on the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool installed with EiffelEnvision.
in_this_section
2 In This Section
accessing.xml Access the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool
Highlights the number of ways the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool can be launched.
using.xml Using the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool
Documentation on how to use and configure the EiffelStudio Project Conversion Tool to successful import EiffelStudio project into EiffelEnvision.
see_also
2 Related Section
See also:
